title: This photo shows a 'die in' protest by environmental activists in Germany
subtitle: A photo showing dozens of people lying on the ground has been shared thousands of times in multiple posts on Facebook alongside a claim it shows the situation in Ecuador during the coronavirus pandemic. The claim is false; the photo in fact shows an environmental protest outside a train station in Germany.
author: factual.afp.com
